trans-unit.source: Represents a workflow that executes activities sequentially.
trans-unit.target: Representa un flujo de trabajo que ejecuta las actividades de forma secuencial.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> is a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> with `Initialized` and `Completed` events for optional processing of parameters.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> es una <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequenceActivity> con los eventos `Initialized` y `Completed` para el procesamiento opcional de parámetros.

trans-unit.source: This makes it particularly useful as a top-level activity when you design sequential-style workflows.
trans-unit.target: Esto lo hace particularmente útil como una actividad de nivel superior al diseñar flujos de trabajo de estilo secuencial.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> is a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, which means the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> can contain other activities.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> es una <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity>, lo que significa que <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> puede contener otras actividades.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Nombre de la actividad definido por el usuario.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" /> class by using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" /> con el nombre de la actividad.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the workflow has finished.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando el flujo de trabajo ha finalizado.

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to create a new <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> class, and set the event handler for the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.Completed> event.
trans-unit.target: En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra cómo crear una nueva clase <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity> y establecer el controlador de eventos para el evento <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.Completed>.

trans-unit.source: This code example is part of the Policy SDK Sample from the DiscountPolicyWorkflow.Designer.cs file.
trans-unit.target: Este ejemplo de código forma parte del ejemplo de SDK de directiva que se encuentra en el archivo DiscountPolicyWorkflow.Designer.cs.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Advanced Policy](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ad079ee-b50b-4af4-9575-597eafc97742).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/includes/crdefault-md.md)] [Advanced directiva](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1ad079ee-b50b-4af4-9575-597eafc97742).

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.Completed" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Representa el <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> destinado al evento <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.Completed" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition" /> in which dynamic updates can be made in the workflow, when overridden in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene o establece una <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition" /> en la que se pueden realizar las actualizaciones dinámicas en el flujo de trabajo, cuando se invalidan en una clase derivada.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition" /> that identifies when dynamic updates can be made.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityCondition" /> que identifica cuándo se pueden realizar las actualizaciones dinámicas.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> asociado a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.

trans-unit.source: Runs the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Ejecuta el flujo de trabajo.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" /> at the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" /> at the end of the requested operation.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionStatus" /> en la <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" /> al final de la operación solicitada.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the workflow is initialized.
trans-unit.target: Se produce cuando se inicializa el flujo de trabajo.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> that targets the <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.Initialized" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Representa el <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty" /> destinado al evento <see cref="E:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.Initialized" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.
trans-unit.target: Objeto <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext" /> asociado a <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" />.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="F:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.CompletedEvent" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" />.
trans-unit.target: Genera el evento <see cref="F:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity.CompletedEvent" /> para <see cref="T:System.Workflow.Activities.SequentialWorkflowActivity" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="executionContext" /> is a null reference (<see langword="Nothing" /> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="executionContext" /> es una referencia nula (<see langword="Nothing" /> en Visual Basic).
